metadata.documentation: Scan DNA sequences for transcription factors
metadata.relations: EDAM_operation:0445 Transcription factor binding site prediction

parameter.name: matrices
parameter.help: The name 'all' reads in all matrix files from the selected \ JASPAR matrix set. You can specify individual matrices by giving \ their names with commas between then, such as: \ 'ma0001.1,ma0015*'. \ The case of the names is not important. You can specify a file of \ matrix names to read in by giving the name of the file holding the \ matrix names with a '@' character in front of it, for example, \ '@matrix.list'. \ Blank lines and lines starting with a hash character or '!' are ignored and all other lines are concatenated together with a comma \ character ',' and then treated as the list of enzymes to search \ for. \ An example of a file of matrix names is: \ ! my matrices \ ma0001.1, ma0002.1 \ ! other matrices \ ma0010.1 \ ma0032* \ ma0053.1

parameter.name: threshold
parameter.help: If the matrix score is greater than or equal to this percentage \ then a hit will be reported

parameter.name: exclude
parameter.information: Comma separated matrix list for exclusion
parameter.help: The names of any matrices to exclude from the 'matrices' \ list. Matrices are specified in the same way as for the \ selection list.

parameter.name: both
parameter.help: If set then both the forward and reverse strands are searched

parameter.name: outfile
parameter.taglist: float:pc=Score_Percent str:id=ID str:name=Name str:species=Species str:class=Class str:supergroup=Supergroup str:fam=Family str:paz=Pazar_TF_ID str:pseq=Protein_Seq str:exp=Experiment str:pmid=Source_PMID float:info=Info_Content str:jaspar=Closest_Jaspar str:transfac=Closest_Transfac float:mcs=MCS_Score str:built=Built_From
